Trade/Device Name(s): COBAS INTEGRA Glucose HK New Formulation
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for COBAS INTEGRA Glucose HK New Formulation enzymatic assay for quantitative glucose determination on COBAS INTEGRA systems
Indications for Use Summary: In vitro test for the quantitative determination of glucose in serum, plasma, urine and cerebrospinal fluid (CSF) on COBAS INTEGRA systems; used in diagnosis and treatment of carbohydrate metabolism disorders including diabetes mellitus and idiopathic hypoglycemia
